metadata.title: CVE-2018-14335 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in H2 1.4.197. Insecure handling of permissions inthe backup function allows attackers to read sensitive files (outside oftheir permissions) via a symlink to a fake database file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-14335` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libh2-java - 1.4.198
No subscription required

criterions.comment: h2database package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.4.198').
